description:
Are you directing your life? 

Self-confidence is something many people would like to have more of. However they aren't sure how to get. The way you perceive yourself is the way others see you. Are you looking to others for approval? Your Self-confidence, your self-respect and trust are connected with each other. They interrelate. What are your options, when part of your mind says ' you can't do it', or 'you are not good enough'.

The workshop will include theory and practical exercises to cover the fundamental basics - in addition to many examples to illustrate the theories in action. 

There is a minimum fee of 20 euro per attendee for logistic purposes for the workshop.
name: Workshop - Are You Directing Your Life?

description:
Did you ever Roller-Coaster in your emotions? One day up.... the next day feeling down?

When you feel happy, and for no apparent reason, suddenly start feeling down, somebody made this happen.

Attend the workshop and get the basic fundamental reasons why you go up and down in humor.

The workshop gives opportunity to understand the basic fundamentals and possibility to do some practical exercises.

There is a minimum fee of 30 Euros per attendees.

Only RSVP with valid email and mobile number will be considered valid.
how_to_find_us: The venue will be announced few days before the workshop - depending on number of confirmed attendees.
name: Workshop: One day up ... the next day down!

description:
HOW TO IMPROVE RELATIONSHIP WITH OTHERS! 

Do you have problems and worries with any of your current relationships? 

Are there old relationships you would like to fix?

Are there new relationships you would like to start?

Attend this unique workshop and find answers to some of your questions. You will also have opportunity to actually exercise what you learn so you can see how it works in real life and in action!

The workshop will be on Sunday 23rd of November from 15:30-18:00. 

Price per attendee is 20 Euros which covers logistics. 

There are limited seats, so make sure you are registered and paid in order to get access to the workshop. 

To register contact Homeira Kroone at [masked] and bank wire amount of 20 Euros to:

Agora-The Company CoachAlmere, The NetherlandsBank: ING Almere, The NetherlandsINBAN: NL85 INGB[masked]BIC: INGBNL2A.

See you at the workshop!
how_to_find_us: Ground floor - look for the sign Workshop!
name: Workshop - How to Improve Relationships With Others!
